query:
UPDATE island_guides SET 
overview = 'Maafushi is a vibrant local island in Kaafu Atoll, offering an authentic Maldivian experience without the luxury resort prices. Known for its excellent diving and snorkeling, budget-friendly guesthouses, and lively atmosphere, Maafushi is perfect for backpackers and water sports enthusiasts.',
attractions = JSON_ARRAY(
  JSON_OBJECT('name', 'Bikini Beach', 'description', 'Main beach with chairs and water sports facilities. Clear turquoise waters ideal for swimming and relaxation.'),
  JSON_OBJECT('name', 'Biyadhoo Reef', 'description', 'Popular snorkeling destination with colorful coral gardens and tropical fish.'),
  JSON_OBJECT('name', 'Turtle Reef', 'description', 'Excellent spot for turtle watching and snorkeling with pristine coral formations.'),
  JSON_OBJECT('name', 'Local Island Shops', 'description', 'Colorful local shops and cafes selling souvenirs and handicrafts.')
),
activities = JSON_ARRAY(
  JSON_OBJECT('name', 'Snorkeling Tours', 'description', 'Half-day snorkeling trips to nearby reefs. $15-25 per person.'),
  JSON_OBJECT('name', 'Scuba Diving', 'description', 'Single dives ($40), Discover Scuba ($75), 2-day courses ($315).'),
  JSON_OBJECT('name', 'Dolphin Watching', 'description', 'Evening boat tours to spot dolphins in their natural habitat.'),
  JSON_OBJECT('name', 'Fishing Trips', 'description', 'Morning fishing ($80) or sunset fishing with BBQ dinner ($25).'),
  JSON_OBJECT('name', 'Resort Day Tours', 'description', 'Visit luxury resort islands and explore overwater bungalows. $70-100.'),
  JSON_OBJECT('name', 'Water Sports', 'description', 'Jetskiing, windsurfing, parasailing, kayaking, and paddleboarding.'),
  JSON_OBJECT('name', 'Picnic Island Tours', 'description', 'Half-day trips to sandbanks with lunch and snorkeling. $30-40.')
),
foodAndDining = JSON_ARRAY(
  JSON_OBJECT('name', 'Local Restaurants', 'description', 'Affordable eateries serving traditional Maldivian cuisine. $5-15.'),
  JSON_OBJECT('name', 'Beachfront Cafes', 'description', 'Casual cafes with sea views, serving coffee and light meals. $3-10.'),
  JSON_OBJECT('name', 'Hotel Restaurants', 'description', 'Guesthouses offer dining options ranging from budget to mid-range. $10-25.'),
  JSON_OBJECT('name', 'BBQ Dinners', 'description', 'Sunset fishing trips often include BBQ dinners on the boat or beach. $25.')
),
quickFacts = JSON_ARRAY(
  'Budget-friendly local island alternative to luxury resorts',
  'Excellent diving and snorkeling with diverse marine life',
  'Home to vibrant backpacker community and lively nightlife',
  'Easily accessible from Male by ferry (45 min, $3-5) or speedboat (30 min, $18-25)',
  'Modest dress code required on the island',
  'Multiple guesthouses and budget hotels available',
  'Water sports and fishing are popular activities'
),
flightInfo = 'Fly into Velana International Airport (MLE) in Male, then take a ferry or speedboat to Maafushi.',
speedboatInfo = 'Speedboat from Male takes approximately 30 minutes and costs $18-25 per person. Multiple daily departures.',
ferryInfo = 'Public ferry from Male takes approximately 45 minutes and costs $3-5 per person. Budget-friendly option with multiple daily schedules.'
WHERE id = 2;

logs: ERROR 1054 (42S22) at line 1: Unknown column 'activities' in 'field list'
